data.text: Mii Paolo, karumiya a Yesu Kuristo wo uttuna wa Nlhuku, vamoka ni munnihu Timotheo
ninoolhepa iwarakha ni uwiiha uwaninyu ashilhoko ihu attu a Nlhuku, attu o ukhulhuvelhiya anrumelhenlhe Kuristo nri Ukolosai.
Mahuku onkhaye vanoolhapelha ihuni ninonshukuru Nlhuku, Athumwanaya Athithi Yesu Kuristo,
ukhalhawaya niheewa mwaha wo nrima winyu wo unrumelhelha Kuristo Yesu ni mwaha wo waattuna winyu attu onkhaye a Nlhuku.
Uttuna ni nrima winyu chinokhulhuvelha ilhe yeesheriye inyu wiirimu. Ukhulhuvelha ulhe weewilhe inyu, vaapachenre inyu uhimeriya ikeekhene yo Malhove Orera.

Malhove Orera aaphilhe uwaninyu mwaatti, thoko chaari aya velhaponi vonkhaye ni waarukunusha attu mirima ahiye uwonya avire moombone ni wunnuwa thoko chiri aya uwaninyu mwaattiva toka nihuku veewilhe inyu mwaha wo nnema wa Nlhuku ni uchuwelha ikekhiaye.
Epafra, namitheko nkhunanihu, namitheko o uttuniya a Kuristo wo nlhatu wihu owittuchinheni mwaha wo nnema wa Nlhuku
ahonihimeria mwaha wo uttuna nvaheriye inyu ni Iphumu ya Nlhuku.

Wo yoyo nlhatu uyo toka veewilhe ihu mwaha unowaachani mwaatti nihokhalha ni ulhapelhakani ikatema chonkhaye. Ninonlhapelha Nlhuku wiira ovaheni irusho cho uchuwelha uttuna wawe, wo irusho ni uchuwelha unovahiya ni Iphumu ya Nlhuku.

Ninolhapelha chiicho wiira nkhalhe thoko chinothanana aya Athithi ni upanga chittu chinaaphwanelha. Makhalhelho o ukumi inyu upangeke moombone o kila nikosho no mitheko chorera ni wunnuwa ni unchuwelha Nlhuku.
Nlhuku wo wooria wawe wo nthimicho ovaheni machiri wiira nvilhelheke wo kila iphiro wo uhikhwa nrima,
nteelhiyaka mirima ni waashukuru Athithi oworinheni mwaattiva ukhalha ni mapuro awinyu eeshenre aya attu aya wi imwene yo munthukoni.
Nlhuku ahonoopolha ukhuma ikuru yo mwiipiphini, nkayaniwiiha wi imwene yo Mwaamwanaya anonttuna aya.
Wo iphome awe yoyo ninowoopolhiya, ninohiyereriya uwonya wihu.
Kuristo mwonne ihu we ikekhiaye phi nlhikaaniho na Nlhuku hinoonia. Yoyo ahaawo chittu chonkhaye chihinaya wuupiya.

Ukhalhawaya wo iphiro awe yoyo Kuristo uyo, chittu chonkhaye chahoupiya, cho velhaponi ni cho wiirimu, chittu chinoonia ni chittu chihinoonia, attu o ukhalhelha ihiche yo utawara ni mamwene ni attu o ikuru ni attu o machiri. Chittu chonkhaye chahoupiya wo iphiro awe ni wo nlhatu wawe.
Kuristo ahaawo vatulhi chittu chonkhaye chihinaya wuupiya ni wo ulhutaana ni yoyo chittu chonkhaye chiholhutaanihiya.
Yoyo phi muru wo iruttu awe iri phi nlhoko wa attu anonrumelhelha. Yoyo phi machokholhelho o ukumi. Yoyo phi nttara o upacha uhihimmwa, wiira akhalhe phi machokholhelho o chittu chonkhaye.
Ukhalhawaya Nlhuku ahottuna utimira wawe wonkhaye ukhalhe nhina mwawe Kuristo.
Wo iphiro yo Mwaamwanawe, Nlhuku ahohokolhosha ilhapo ni chittu chonkhaye chuupiye. Ni wo iphome awe yaarihelhe vansalaabani ahowiiha mpuha nkaathaniha chittu chonkhaye velhaponi ni wiirimu.
Ni inyu mwaatti varachi mwaakhalha utayi ni Nlhuku, mwaari amalhaponi awe wo nlhatu wo irusho ni mitheko chinyu cho uhilhoka.
Nansho vano, nhomwaathanana Nlhuku wo iruttu yo Mwaamwanawe, wo iphiro yo nookhwa awe, wiira oholhelhiheni uwannyawe nnari atakatifu wo uhikhalha ni nlhatu wo ulhaphachiya.

Nthepaka ulhokelha mu nsingi wo ukhomaalha wo munrimani, mena nhitikhinye ni uhiya ukhulhuvelha upantte inyu veewilhe inyu Malhove Orera ahimiachiye wo kila ntu wuuthi irimu, velhaponi va. Nlhove kithanlhiye aka mii Paolo ukhalha namitheko aya.

Vano etu, kinooteelhiya nrima vanohuva aka wo nlhatu winyu, ukhalhawaya wo uhuvihiya waka, kinotimiriha mwiiruttuni mwaka awukuwilhe uhuvihiya wa Kuristo iruttu awe iri wa attu onkhaye anonrumelhelha Kuristo.
Ni mii kihopangiya ni Nlhuku ukhalha namitheko a attu anrumelhenlhe Yesu kivare ntheko wo umalhiha uhimiacha nttenga awe wo utimira.
Yoyo nttenga uyo wahovithiya wiira attu ahichuwelhe toka mahuku o uhimalha, nansho vano uhopatakulhiya wa attu awe.

Nlhuku hothanana waapatakulhelha attu awe, nhakhu ni nthimicho wo nlhove nivithiye nno niwanelhe wa attu o velhaponi. Nlhove nivithiye nno phi Kuristo ri nhina mwinyu, ni hii nnookhulhuvelha ukhalha nhina nthimicho wa Nlhuku.

Wo yoyo nlhatu uyo etu ninonhimiacha Kuristo wa attu onkhaye, wo irusho chonkhaye, ninomwaamuka ni umwiittuchiha kila ntu wiira ninrweehe kila mmoka mmiholho wa Nlhuku nakhomanlhe muulhutaanani ni Kuristo.
Wo yayo malhakelho o uhimiacha yoyo mwaha uyo, kinoomananiha ni ukuruvalhelha wo machiri kivanhe awe Kuristo anopanga ntheko nhina mwaka.
